item.name: 5. Seller sends messages for a listing
6. View messages between user and other seller/buyer for specific listing
6b. View ALL chats between user and other seller/buyers
7b. Make changes to reservation made (use reservationId)
8. Seller chooses to view all reservations
9. Seller chooses to accept a reservation (use reservationId)
[ANYTIME]  Create a new suspicious activity log report
[ANYTIME] Get ALL activity log (report) for specific user
[ANYTIME] Get specific activity log (report) within date range for specific user
More Functions
4x.1 Sending message for your own item (to yourself)
4x.2 Sending message with no specified chatId OR uuid (Buyer's)
5x.1 If buyerUUID specified, uuid cannot be listing owner's uuid
5x.2 If sellerUUID specified, uuid must be listing owner's uuid
Send a message to listing's seller
View messages for specified user for specific listing
Send a message to a buyer (must specify chatId OR buyerUUID)
1x.1 Creating user when they already exist - existing uuid/email/username (regardless of casing)

item.name: Blocked Update to 'restricted' listing (update to change content to sus item)
7x. Invalid listingId when reserving an item
7x. Reservation already made by same buyer before
7x. transaction is for meetup but does not specify meetup point
7x. Reservation does not provide a price offer
7x. Cannot make new reservations for already reserved items
7bx. Cannot make changes to others' reservations (use reservationId)
9x. Cannot accept multiple reservations for items (use reservationId)
View All Reservations for a listingId
view ONE reservations as seller (specified reservation id)
Make changes to own reservation made (use reservationId)
View all chats between user and other seller/buyers
Find specific chat between user and another seller/buyer
Create a new suspicious activity log report
Get ALL activity log (report) for specific user
Get specific activity log (report) within date range for specific user Copy
